description:
This all-purpose, six-wheel utility vehicle finds use in all branches of the U.N.G. forces. Light weight, fast and reliable, the M-299 can accommodate four passengers (including driver) plus some small cargo. It is typically used for light personnel transport over short distances. The M-299 also includes communication equipment and hands-free two-way speakers. Captain http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker] often drove a standard green M-299 during his post aboard the SDF-1 while First Lieutenant http://anidb.net/ch7652 [Hayase Misa] was seen driving a blue M-299 at the U.N.G. forces Alaska Base.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/sdfmacross/m299.htm
name: M-299 Sugar Foot
